org.academiadecodigo.macasdoze.gameobjects

Class Apple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.academiadecodigo.macasdoze.gameobjects.GameObject
      • org.academiadecodigo.macasdoze.gameobjects.MovableGameObject
        • org.academiadecodigo.macasdoze.gameobjects.Apple
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackApple, GreenApple, PurpleApple, RedApple

    public abstract class Apple
extends MovableGameObject
    Defines what methods and properties an Apple will have.

    Created by vi.KINGS David Neves, Fabio Santos, Helia Marcos and Mario Ponte on 23/05/16.
